alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Portage; Vilas; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 18 at 9:25PM CST until February 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, areas of blowing and drifting snow with snow showers ending. Little to no additional snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery or icy road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open/rural areas. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 to 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Portage; Vilas; Wood
